tweet: I’m thankful for our men and women in the military who put their lives on the line to protect ours, our first responders who give up their holidays to keep us safe, & our medical professionals who are skipping family dinners to keep us healthy. #HappyThanksgiving

Today I stand with all the #Dreamers in #NY04 and across the country as the Supreme Court hears arguments that could decide the fate of #DACA.

The average #DACA recipient was 6 years old when they arrived in the US. This is their home and we must fight to #ProtectTheDream.

I strongly condemn the indiscriminate rocket attacks from Gaza targeting innocent civilians. This is yet another frightening reminder of the daily threat that many Israelis are forced to live with. The US stands by our ally Israel and supports its right to defend itself.

Today, we honor the brave men and women who have served our country. While we can never fully repay them for their sacrifice, we can all take action every day to support veterans and their families across the country. On #VeteransDay, we renew our commitment to that cause.

Today we commemorate #Kristallnacht, the 1938 Night of the Broken Glass, where hundreds of synagogues and thousands of Jewish homes and businesses were looted, burned and destroyed. We must remember, today and always, our responsibility to stand up to antisemitism. #NeverAgain
